cards.label: Market Discovery
cards.prompt: Improve market discovery UX: simplify filters, prioritize location-first results, and surface trending hashtags without overwhelming new users.

cards.label: Application Flow
cards.prompt: Reduce friction in the application flow: multi-step form, pre-fill from profile, auto-save drafts, and clear status timeline.

cards.label: Promoter Claiming
cards.prompt: Clarify promoter claiming: eligibility criteria, verification steps, and clear CTA placement on market detail.

cards.label: Community Photos
cards.prompt: Improve photo sharing: mobile upload flow, lightweight compression, and top-voted hero selection transparency.

cards.label: Hashtag Voting
cards.prompt: Refine hashtag voting: limit noise, surface top tags, and align with market categories and accessibility filters.

cards.label: Tracking Statuses
cards.prompt: Clarify status progression (interested → applied → booked → completed) with UI cues and timeline messaging.

cards.label: Notifications
cards.prompt: Tune notifications: prioritize application updates, reduce noise, and ensure mobile-friendly delivery and settings.

cards.label: Expense Tracking
cards.prompt: Simplify expense tracking for market events: quick-entry form, category presets, and profit summary.

cards.label: Mobile Accessibility
cards.prompt: Audit mobile accessibility: 44px touch targets, contrast ratios, and keyboard navigation for modal flows.

cards.label: Onboarding Friction
cards.prompt: Reduce onboarding friction: progressive registration, social login options, and value before signup.

cards.label: MongoDB Connection Health
cards.prompt: Verify live MongoDB connectivity: ensure Mongoose uses the correct env var, add startup health checks, connection retry/backoff, and clear logs for connection failures.

cards.label: User Login API
cards.prompt: Harden the login flow: validate inputs, confirm password hashing/compare, standardize error responses, and ensure auth tokens are issued consistently.

cards.label: User Registration
cards.prompt: Fix user creation with live MongoDB: validate payloads, enforce unique email/username, hash passwords, set default roles, and handle duplicate errors cleanly.

cards.label: User Management
cards.prompt: Audit user management endpoints: list/update/deactivate users with proper RBAC, input validation, and audit logging.

cards.label: Roles & Permissions
cards.prompt: Align role-based access control with API routes: confirm role checks in middleware and ensure admin-only paths are protected.

cards.label: Email Verification
cards.prompt: Stabilize email verification: generate tokens, store expiry, mark verified, and handle re-send flow for unverified users.

cards.label: Password Reset
cards.prompt: Review password reset flow: secure token generation, expiry validation, and forced logout of old sessions after reset.

cards.label: Refresh Tokens
cards.prompt: Implement/verify refresh token rotation and reuse detection; ensure token storage and invalidation are correct.

cards.label: Session Security
cards.prompt: Add session hardening: rate limit login, lockout on repeated failures, and optional device/session tracking.

cards.label: User Schema Integrity
cards.prompt: Validate user schema integrity in MongoDB: required fields, indexes, normalization, and safe defaults for new users.
